frameDefinitions: The existence of a State_of_affairs is sufficient reason for taking an Action .
In this frame a State_of_affairs is prohibited (or allowed) by a Principle.
An Agent causes an Impactor to make sudden, forcible contact with an Impactee, or manipulates two (or more)
A Law regulates activities or states of affairs within a Jurisdiction, dictating what Required states should be the case and what Forbidden states should not.
In this frame, an Authority allows a Protagonist to know (in some way) that they may or may not engage in an Action.
frameExamples: The underwater sequences <t>warrant</t> the price of the admission alone.
He <t>slammed</t> his fist down on the table and bellowed something unintelligible.
A rationale for using denatured gp160 as a therapeutic <t>agent</t> in HIV-infected people is to boost the immune response .
The new <t>act</t> banning smoking in public will pass soon.
The police officer <t>forbid</t> me from turning around .
listRoleDefinitions: An Eventuality or an Entity that is taken to constitute sufficient reason for taking another <fen>Action</fen>.
An <fen>Action</fen> that is taken to be justifiable given the <fen>State_of_Affairs</fen>.
A moral, legal, or social norm which rules a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> to be inadmissible behavior or an outcome of behavior.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the prohibiting occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the prohibiting occurs.
The <fen>Impactee</fen> is the entity which is hit by the <fen>Impactor</fen>.
The <fen>Impactor</fen> is the entity that hits the <fen>Impactee</fen> because of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s efforts.
The <fen>Impactors</fen> are the multiple entities that collide.
The <fen>Agent</fen>  causes an impact.

The <fen>Cause</fen> marks expressions that indicate some non-intentional, 
typically non-human, force that causes an <fen>Impactor</fen> to make sudden, 
forcible contact with an Impactee.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen>  when the impact occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The change brought about by the Substance.
The internally undifferentiated physical entity that has an <fen>Effect</fen>.
This role identifies the rule designed to guide activity, deprecating some types of activity and/or requiring other types of activity. This role is incorporated into each LU in this frame.
The state-of-affairs which is disallowed by the <fen>Law</fen>.
A state-of-affairs which the <fen>Law</fen> declares must be maintained.
The <fen>Authority</fen> orders the <fen>Protagonist</fen> to not engage in a particular <fen>Action</fen>.
The <fen>Protagonist</fen> wants to engage in an <fen>Action</fen>, but is ordered not to by the <fen>Authority</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is what the <fen>Protagonist</fen> seeks to do, but is ordered not to.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the denying of permission occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the denial of permission occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>A heavy contact to the opponent 's face</fex> may not merit just a verbal warning

<fex>The Establishment Clause of the First Amendment</fex> plainly prohibits the
establishment of a national religion by Congress.
What I want to know is who smacked <fex>my head</fex> with a 10-ton truck?
Those hoodlums strike my car <fex>with water balloons</fex> every day!
Mr. Addams likes to collide <fex>toy trains</fex> at high speed.
<fex>One juggler</fex> was hitting the ceiling with every other ball.
A postman rammed his Fiat Panda into a getaway car <fex>after spotting the burglars </fex> .
Father Shanahan , of Rushey Mead , Leicester , rammed his Datsun into another car <fex>on the way to the city 's Gilroes cemetery</fex>.
There is a clear co-variation between allergic symptoms in children and the concentration of <fex>softening</fex> agents in their homes.
While marijuana?s advocates say <fex>the drug</fex> is a mellowing agent that can be used for medicinal purposes, some police will say marijuana is a gateway drug.
I think we need a law <fex>against all firearms within city limits</fex>.
The law <fex>that all minors must be accompanied by an adult</fex> is a laughingstock.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the S-League Championship and Singapore Cup
